categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A Force-sensitive Mikkian served as a Jedi of the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars.

A member of the Jedi Order and a Force-sensitive Mikkian, the Jedi lived in the time of the Clone Wars. When the cyborg general Grievous made for the Jedi Temple on Ledeve, the Mikkian's Padawan, a male human, fled towards a starship as his master took up arms and stood against their lightsaber-wielding foe.

However, in the ensuing confrontation, the Jedi Master was impaled by Grievous and left dead on the forest ground. Grievous claimed the Jedi's lightsaber and proceeded to dispatch the Padawan with said blade just as quickly as he had done the master.

A Mikkian, the Jedi stood ground against Grievous for the Padawan to flee for safety in the face of the infamous cyborg warrior and Jedi killer's onslaught, although the master was slain by Grievous' concealed third blade.
A Jedi stationed on the jungle planet Ledeve along with a Padawan learner, the Mikkian was equipped with a blue, single-bladed lightsaber and wore typical Jedi robes.
The unnamed Mikkian Jedi's first and only appearance is in the early 2019 comic Age of Republic - General Grievous 1.
